TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NavigationCommands extends System.Object
public ref class NavigationCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组标准的与导航相关的命令。

span.span: Provides a standard set of navigation-related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类公开一组标准的与导航相关的命令，包括浏览器和文档。The class exposes a standard set of navigation-related commands, including browser and document navigation. 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BrowseBack As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ BrowseBack { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the command.
The routed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示想要导航回前一页的日志中。This command indicates the intention to navigate back to the previous page in the journal. 并实现对响应的支持，尽管不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。 and implement support for responding to the , although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BrowseForward As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ BrowseForward { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the command.
The routed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示有意要向前定位日志中的下一页。This command indicates the intention to navigate forward the next page in the journal. 并实现对响应的支持命令时，虽然不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。 and implement support for responding to the command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BrowseHome As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ BrowseHome { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the command.
The routed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示主页导航的意图。This command indicates the intention to navigate home. 响应没有实现命令在任何给定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]类。There is no implementation for responding to the command on any given [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] class. 在这种情况下，你需要提供相应的实现，在示例中所示。As such, you need to provide an appropriate implementation, which is shown in the example. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示停止浏览器加载的意图。This command indicates the intention to stop the browser loading. 并实现对响应的支持命令时，虽然不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。 and implement support for responding to the command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
